message: Let's split it fairly, I'll take a bit more
I'm feeling generous, but let's be realistic. This offer won't be as good in later rounds.
I'll meet you halfway between my first offer and your last one
Time is running out, let's settle this. This is my final offer.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm not buying it. Meet me closer to the middle
Okay, Alice, let's be real.  We're both losing out here with the inflation eating away at this. A 50/50 split is the fairest and ensures we both walk away with something substantial.
